column2: "Nna Ahab wɔ mbabanyin eduosuon wɔ Samaria. Na Jehu kyerɛɛw nwoma
column3: na ɔsomae ma wɔdze kɔr Samaria dze kɛmaa Jezreel asafohemfo
column5: na hɔn a wɔnyɛɛn Ahab ne mba no
column8: "Sɛ nwoma yi du hom nkyɛn a
column9: ɔnam dɛ hom wura ne mba wɔ hom nkyɛn
column11: kurow a wɔabɔ ho ban so
column12: na akodze wɔ hom nkyɛn no yi;"

column2: "hom nhwehwɛ hom wura ne mba no mu nyia oye na ɔfata na wɔmfa no nsi n'egya n'ahengua no do
column3: na hom nko mma hom wura fi."

column2: "Na wosuroo mbordo
column3: na wɔsee dɛ

column2: "Na nyia ɔhwɛ fidua no do
column3: na nyia ɔhwɛ kurow no do no
column5: na hɔn a wɔnyɛɛn mba no
column9: na dza ebɛhyɛ hɛn no nyinara yɛbɛyɛ; yɛrennhyɛ nyimpa biara ɔhen: ɔwoara yɛ dza oye wɔ w'enyi do."

column2: "Nna ɔkyerɛɛw hɔn nwoma a otsia mpɛn ebien
column3: dɛ
column5: na hom betsie me ndze a
column7: mekyerɛ hom wura ne mba no
column8: hɔn etsir mbrɛ me nkyɛn ɔkyena siseber yi wɔ Jezreel. Nna ɔhen ne mba no a wɔyɛ nyimpa eduosuon no wɔwɔ kurow no mu nyimpa akɛse no a wɔnyɛn hɔn no nkyɛn."

column2: "Na ɔbaa dɛ
column3: aber a nwoma no dur hɔn nkyɛn no
column4: nna wɔkyeer ɔhen ne mba no
column7: na wɔdze hɔn etsir guguu nkɛntsɛn mu
column8: na wɔsomae ma wɔdze kɛmaa no wɔ Jezreel."

column2: "Na ɔbɔfo bi bae bɛkaa kyerɛɛ no
column3: dɛ
column4: Wɔdze ɔhen ne mba no hɔn etsir no aba. Na ɔsee dɛ
column5: Hom ngu no ekuw ebien wɔ kuropon ahɛnee no ano nkodu anapa."

column2: "Na ɔbaa dɛ
column3: anapa no
column7: Hom dzi bem: hwɛ emi na mepaam mo wura ne tsir do
column8: na mukum no: na woana na okunkum woyinom nyinara?"

column2: "Afei hom nhu dɛ EWURADZE n'asɛm a EWURADZE kae no wɔ Ahab fi ho no mu biara ronntɔ famu: na EWURADZE ayɛ dza ɔnam n'akowaa Elija do kae no."
"Nna Jehu kum Ahab fie hɔn a wɔkae nyinara wɔ Jezreel
column3: na ne nyimpa akɛse nyinara
column6: kodur dɛ oenngyaa no obiara ma ɔaannka."

column2: "Na ɔsoɛree fii hɔ sii mu dɛ ɔrokɔ Samaria. Na aber a ɔwɔ nguanhwɛfo dan a wosusua nguan ho wɔ ɔkwan no mu no
column4: "Jehu nye Judahen Ahazia no nuanom no hyiae
column6: Woananom nye hom? Na wobuaa dɛ
column7: Ahazia no nuanom nye hɛn: na yerisian akɔ ekekyiakyia ɔhen ne mba

column2: "Na ɔsee dɛ
column3: Hom nkyer hɔn enyikan. Na wɔkyekyeer hɔn enyikan
column4: na wokunkum hɔn nguansusua dan no ho mona no ho
column5: mekyerɛ nyimpa eduanan ebien; na oenngyaa hɔn mu biara."

column2: "Na aber a ofi hɔ sii mu rokɔ no
column3: ohun Rekab ne ba Jehonadab dɛ ɔreba ebehyia no kwan: na okyiaa no
column6: dɛ mbrɛ m'akoma tse wɔ w'akoma ho no? Na Jehonadab buaa dɛ
column7: Ɔtse dɛm. Sɛ ɔtse dɛm a
column8: fa wo nsa ma me ɛ. Na ɔdze ne nsa maa no; ma ɔmaa no do kɔr ne nkyɛn wɔ tseaseanam no mu."

column2: "Na ɔsee dɛ
column3: Enye me nkɔ
column4: na kɔhwɛ mo mbɔdzembɔ a mobɔ ma EWURADZE. Nna wɔmaa ɔnye no tsenaa ne tseaseanam no mu."

column2: "Na aber a odur Samaria no
column3: okum hɔn a wɔkae maa Ahab wɔ Samaria no nyinara
column5: dɛ mbrɛ EWURADZE n'asɛm a ɔkaa kyerɛɛ Elija no tse."

column2: "Na Jehu poon ɔman no nyinara hyiae
column3: na ɔsee hɔn dɛ
column4: Ahab soom Baal kakra; na Jehu dze

column2: "Dɛm ntsi afei hom mfrɛ Baal nkɔnhyɛfo no nyinara
column3: n'asomfo nyinara
column5: ma wɔmbra me nkyɛn; mma obiara nnka: osiandɛ mowɔ afɔr kɛse mobɔ mema Baal; obiara a ɔbɛka no ɔrenntsena ase. Na Jehu dze
column6: ɔyɛɛ no bradato mu ama ɔaasɛɛ Baal n'asomfo no."

column2: "Na Jehu see dɛ
column3: Hom ntsew ehyiadzi krɔnkrɔn ho mma Baal. Na wɔpaae."

column2: "Na Jehu somae ma wokekyiin Israel nyinara mu: na Baal n'asomfo no nyinara bae
column3: ma nyimpa biara annka a ɔammba. Na wɔbaa Baal fie; na Baal fie no yɛɛ ma fi tsir kɔ tsir."

column2: "Na ɔsee nyia ɔhwɛ ntardan do no dɛ
column3: Fa ntar brɛ Baal n'asomfo no nyinara. Na ɔdze ntar brɛɛ hɔn."

column2: "Na Jehu na Rekab ne ba Jehonadab sii mu kɔr Baal fie; na ɔsee Baal n'asomfo no dɛ
column3: Hom nhwehwɛ mu nhu amma EWURADZE no nkowaa mu obiara aammbɛka hom ho wɔ ha

column2: "Na wosii mu kɔr mu dɛ wɔrokɔbɔ hɔn okum afɔr na ɔhyew afɔr. Afei na Jehu ahyɛ mbarimba eduowɔtwe ama noho wɔ dan ekyir
column3: dɛ
column4: Sɛ mbarimba a medze hɔn rehyɛ hom nsa yi mu biara fi nsa guan a
column6: no nkwa bɛhyɛ no nkwa ananmu."

column2: "Na ɔbaa dɛ
column3: ntsɛmara a owiee ɔhyew afɔr no bɔ no
column4: nna Jehu see brampafo na asafohemfo no dɛ
column5: Hom nkɔ mu nkokuku hɔn; ma hom mma obiara mmfir edzi. Na wɔdze afona anomu kunkum hɔn; na brampafo na asafohemfo no totoow hɔn gui
column6: na wosii mu kɔr Baal fie kurow no mu."

column2: "Na wɔdze Baal fie edum no puei bɛhyeew no."
"Na wodwuruuw Baal no dum no guu famu
column3: na wodwuruuw Baal ne fie no guu famu
column4: na ɔyɛɛ no egyananbea dze bodu ndɛ da yi."

column2: "Mbrɛ Jehu sii sɛɛ Baal fii Israel nye no."
"Naaso Nebat ne ba Jeroboam no bɔn a ɔdze maa Israel yɛɛ bɔn no dze
column3: Jehu emmfi ekyir emmfi
column4: ɔnye dɛ sika anantwimba a wɔwɔ Bɛtɛl na Dan no dze ɔannsɛɛ hɔn."

column2: "Na EWURADZE see Jehu dɛ
column3: Osiandɛ ayɛ no yie dɛ ayɛ dza ɔtsen wɔ m'enyi do
column4: na ayɛ Ahab fie dɛ mbrɛ dza ɔwɔ m'akoma mu nyinara tse no ntsi
column5: wo mbabanyin a wofi wo mbasantsen a otsia anan no mu bɛtsena Israel ahengua do."

column2: "Naaso Jehu annhwɛ yie dɛ ɔdze n'akoma nyinara bɛnantsew wɔ EWURADZE
column3: Israel Nyankopɔn ne mbra do: oemmfi Jeroboam no bɔn a ɔdze maa Israel fomee no ho emmfi."

column2: "Nda no mu na EWURADZE hyɛɛ ase dɛ orukuw Israel do: na Hazael kunkum hɔn wɔ Israel ntoaado nyinara;"
"ofi Jordan boka afamu
column3: Gilead asaase no nyinara
column7: ofi Aroer a ɔwɔ Arnon bɔnsa nkyɛn

column2: "Afei Jehu no ho nsɛm nkaa no
column3: na dza ɔyɛe nyinara
column5: ana wɔnnkyerɛɛw no wɔ Israel ahemfo hɔn Mbermunsɛm nwoma mu?"

column2: "Na Jehu kɔr ne nsamankyir: na wosiee no wɔ Samaria. Na ne babanyin Jehoahaz na odzii hen wɔ n'ananmu"
"Na mber a Jehu dze dzii hen wɔ Israel do wɔ Samaria no yɛ mfe eduonu awɔtwe."
